calculationPeriod.label: Calculation period
calculationPeriod.tooltip: Choose whether to calculate using monthly or yearly values.

childAllowances.label: Child allowances
childAllowances.tooltip: Select the number of children to be considered according to ELStAM using the child allowance counter. The allowance will be taken into account when calculating income tax, solidarity surcharge, and church tax.

churchTax.label: Church tax
churchTax.tooltip: Select whether church tax is applicable.

dob.label: Date of birth
dob.tooltip: Enter your date of birth. Employees over 64 years old are eligible for the age relief amount under § 24a EStG.

federalState.label: Federal state
federalState.tooltip: Select the federal state where your place of employment is located (not to be confused with the workplace in a tax-related sense).

grossIncome.label: Gross income
grossIncome.tooltip: Your gross income for the calculation period.

healthInsuranceAdditionalContribution.label: Health ins. additional contrib.
healthInsuranceAdditionalContribution.tooltip: The additional contribution of your health insurance provider.

numChildren.label: Number of children
numChildren.tooltip: Select the number of children eligible to be considered for nursing care insurance to account for contribution reductions.

nursingCareInsuranceSurcharge.label: Nursing care ins. surcharge
nursingCareInsuranceSurcharge.tooltip: Childless insured persons aged over 23 are required to pay a surcharge of 0.6% for nursing care insurance unless they provide proof of parenthood to their employer.

taxAllowance.label: Annual tax allowance
taxAllowance.tooltip: The current tax-free allowance retrieved via ELStAM for the employee.

taxClass.label: Tax class
taxClass.tooltip: Select the applicable tax class according to ELStAM.
